in that projected time table, I would appreciate your
notifying Don Quayle who will have staff responsibility
for the administration for this project. In addition
I would like to have periodic reports of this activity
sent to Mr. Quayle on October 1, 1969, January 1, 1970
and a complete report together with financial details
to be submitted no later than June 30, 1970.
We feel this move to Washington,D.C. to be consistent
with the general direction that NER and the Corporation
see for public radio. We encourage your efforts toward
establishing a facility in Washington,D.C. which can
better serve the radio stations of the country.
With kindest regards.
Sincerely yours
